options.name: A calendar of events and activities used to accomplish a development goal
A collection of processes, methods and tools used to accomplish a development goal
An application development cycle that is commonly understood and applied
A process that must be followed rigidly

questions.name: A methodology can be defined as: (Choose Two)

options.name: Use Log-Usage report to see hourly usage snapshot
Ask for the requestor ids and then lookup the tracer output file, then analyze them using tracer viewer
Use reports in PDC that will provide hour by hour alerts seen in the system
Use the standard activity that performs a SQL query against Database to get this information

questions.name: Users accessing a production system reported that the system was behaving erratically between 3.00PM and 4.00PM and they do not see those issues now. Which tools will help you in diagnosing what exactly happened during that time period? (Choose One)
